title: Wildfire
desc:
Post 289
- All players discard their highest numbered <:red:1106234051129507932> or <:yellow:1106234135384699023> card, random if tied, unnumbered special cards will count as having the number 7, If a player does not have any <:red:1106234051129507932> or <:yellow:1106234135384699023> cards, they must draw 2 cards.
